alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Idaho County through 415 PM PDT... At 341 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Grangeville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clearwater, Stites and Harpster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
